product_name: Mission Athletecare EnduraCool Cooling Arm Sleeves
long_description: Got a long run planned in hot sun? Prepare to be amazed by the cooling properties and UPF 45 sun protection of the EnduraCool Cooling Arm Sleeves from Mission Athletecare. To get instant cooling: soak the sleeves in water or sweat, wring them out, grab at both ends and pull hands apart, snapping 3-5 times to activate. After 1-2 minutes, fabric cools to 30degF below average body temperature. Peformance fabric retains moisture, circulates the molecules, and regulates the rate of evaporation to give a prolonged cooling effect-without feeling wet. Pulse-point cooling is chemical free. EnduraCool Cooling Arm Sleeves from Mission Athletecare are rated for UPF 45 sun protection.
short_description: Got a long run planned in hot sun? Prepare to be amazed by the cooling properties and UPF 45 sun protection of the EnduraCool Cooling Arm Sleeves from Mission Athletecare.
